title: Okinawa Prefecture
summary: Okinawa Prefecture (沖縄県, Japanese: Okinawa-ken, Okinawan: ʔUchinā-chin[1]) is a prefecture of Japan located on the Ryukyu Islands.[2] Okinawa Prefecture is the southernmost and westernmost prefecture of Japan, has a population of 1,457,162 (2 February 2020) and has a geographic area of 2,281 km2 (880 sq mi).
